html:
Soâ€¦what is the Monday Poll?

Excellent question! It isnâ€™t, contrary to its name, an actual poll, like with little clicky buttons. Itâ€™s just a list of more or less random questions Iâ€™ve been posting on this blog every Monday morning for the past quadrillion years (since 2007).

1. What would you rather do on a rainy day: go to the movies with a friend, cozy up at home with a good book and a cup of tea, or go on an adventurous and fun (and very wet) hike?

Right now movies with a friend sounds like it would be fun! Of course weâ€™d have to have all the snacks â€“ popcorn, M&Ms and bubbly water.

2. What game show would you absolutely dominate: Wheel of Fortune, Jeopardy or The Price Is Right?

Iâ€™d have the best chances at The Price Is Right. Canâ€™t say Iâ€™d dominate it, though. Hahaha!

3. Do you wear more makeup now or less makeup than you did a year ago?

I wear a little less these days, but thatâ€™s mostly because of time constraints. I miss having a good 15 or 20 minutes to paint my face. Now I just kinda slap it on and hope for the best.

4. Howâ€™s your mental health these days?

I feel steadier than Iâ€™ve felt in a while, and I think Iâ€™m finally reaching the point where I can push myself to do a little more. Last year really kicked my butt (long story short, I had a health scare, and now things are better), and itâ€™s been taking a long time to recover from living with that fear for over a year.

5. â€˜80s colorful mascara or â€˜80s style bold blush?

Um, both? Theyâ€™re both so fun. I obvs wouldnâ€™t rock it to work. Well, maybe I would. ðŸ™‚

Your friendly neighborhood beauty addict,

Karen

3. Do you wear more makeup now or less makeup than you did a year ago?
